summary: The Weather Research and Forecasting Innovation Reauthorization Act of 2025 (Weather Act Reauthorization Act of 2025) reauthorizes and updates various programs related to weather research, forecasting, and data management within the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA). It focuses on improving weather forecasting accuracy, expanding commercial weather data opportunities, enhancing public communication of weather information, and improving weather information for agriculture and water management. The bill also addresses harmful algal blooms, heat-related health emergencies, and landslide preparedness.
